feed.title: Is SourceForge still trustworthy enough to host this list?

entry.title: Is SourceForge still trustworthy enough to host this list?
entry.summary: A recent warning from HowToGeek advises users to avoid downloading software from SourceForge, which has prompted the deletion of all downloads (including older ones) from the site. Bitcoin Core release announcements have not mentioned SourceForge for a while, and there is no clear consensus on whether or not to move the mailing list elsewhere. Wladimir has expressed no opinion on the matter.
